column3: Broken. Opening and reopening the app shows me theres a hamburger menu in the top right. Probably can set my host in there. But unfortunately _  it disappears immediately. Update: fixed by unpinning my nav bar. Update2: managed to get connected. Selected "weechat ssl" when what I should've selected was "websocket ssl" (I'm connecting to a reverse proxy over ssl/https). Casued a horrible crash loop. Reinstall fixed it. App is actually pretty good despite first impressions _  nice UI.
Um why would you force us to use a signed certificate suddenly? Seriously? I used this app for years but it looks like it's time to uninstall now.
Crash on connect everytime. Requiers a password even when none is needed.
Crashes. Totally useless. Won't connect to the server.
Does not work on s10+ crashes and closes straight away no idea why please fix ty
i'm missing the point of this app... its not a client! ?? trying irccloud... bye
Relay host not set...
Im new to the application
Does not work.

Easiest way to connect relay to my weechat IRC client on my linux/bsd server. Working great so far on Android Pie. It still lacks of 'input insert' commands. So _  I cannot use 'input colors' there too! Apart from that _  it's working great - better than any paid/free Android standalone IRC client!
It works.
good

fantastic app when it does work _  but clearly doesn't like nougat - has not been successfully connecting since then. dev _  hit me up for details - no bug report option in the app as far as I can tell. forced to use glowing bear at the moment and this app is definitely superior to it.
Had some crashing issues at first but now it works like a charm. The only thing missing is loading earlier messages _  like in Glowing Bear. Also _  it loses the scroll position when focus is lost.

Installed Weechat into an ArchLinuxARM chroot _  rsync'd my config files from my desktop _  ran it in a term and connected to localhost in the app.  10\10 My only gripe is that it doesn't like my physical tab key.
Nothing changed in the serverside config _  and I reentered everything in the client. It fails with "wrong password" even though there's no password on the server.
Broke with Nougat _  can't connect at all. No configuration changes in app nor on my server. Reach out of you need more information!

Does everything you would expect and more...if you already know what to expect from a WeeChat relay client.  Don't forget to dig in the options for settings like Connect on launch and Tab button for nick competition.
Can't change buffers without minimising the keyboard.
I re installed the app _  after having my phone reset to factory settings _  I loaded the current version _  but a problem won't let me get past the settings page.

Very nice to use on both tablets and phones. Nice amount of customization and the SSH tunnel feature is a cool extra. And it's completely free and open source _  with no in-app purchases or ads _  which is hard to come by these days.
I've gone through all _  and I mean all of them _  and this definitely the best. I know this is basically not a real IRC client _  but it is still the best.
Still doesn't work on nougat when you use ssh tunnel. It's been almost a year now.
A great relay for weechat. Updates only make it better _  no serious bugs I've found.
Works fantastic! Opens native apps for websites more reliably than other softwares.  Would donate if I could.
I have Weechat running on a server + this app on the phone. It's the perfect combination. I used a ssh Client + screen before which was ok but this works much better. Thx!
I used this app every day _  and I've been doing that for quite some time and it served me well. But the latest update just made it so much better!
Is this app. Seriously. You don't get this kind of thing on iOS.
I wish more IRC clients had this kind of interface and user experience!
Will drain battery from nfull to 15 in an hour or 2
Help me to use and setting this app. Thx
Requires Weechat relay to be available externally. Regardless _  best IRC client for Android hands down.
Very simple an does it's thing!
Broken after last update
This app finally tied it all together
This app is really missing one feature: a donate link.
Doesn't work
Update this aap for the newer version of android please
Works very well.  I particularly like the ability to tunnel through ssh.
Am using
I love this app. Very customizable and reliable.
Great app _  very handy for IRC on-the-go.
Friends
update is looking nice!
Rubish
Great to have!!
Great n fantastic
uma
Great update
Love it

Long time weechat user _  and I just discovered its relay capabilities. Previously I had used yaiic with ZNC on my server _  in addition to weechat on my server _  but this removes the need for ZNC entirely. Such a great app. edit: year and a half later _  still in development and very much improved. The interface is absolutely wonderful _  and beats any standalone client on the Play Store.

This app is absolutely fantastic! I was worried it might chew up a lot of battery being in the background all of the time _  but that is absolutely not the case. Very _  very light on battery usage.  There are a few small quirks like a limited buffer size (I think it might only be 500 lines and is a fixed number).
But it is true! It really works! Not sure if joining a channel is not yet supported or if I've been looking in the wrong places _  but that's no big deal.

Love the app _ and its efficiency. Only issue I have is the limited scroll back. The web app has links to load further history  _ which I used rather frequently. Addition of that feature would render this app rather perfect.

The Menu button doesn't work on Android 5.1 so the app cannot be used in it's present state. When you click the button _  nothing happens. The menu doesn't open or anything at all. This is on my Nexus 7 (2012) running stock Android  5.1.
The previous version was incredibly unstable and the UI was a bit clunky _  but this new version is stable and slick. Nice work _  devs!
Crashes whenever someone highlights me though _  it appears to be caused by highlight alert (sound).
This is a great app for connecting to Weechat.  It has all the features i could ask for.  The developer is more than willing to work with you to resolve bugs and add features (if appropriate).
It was already great _  now it is even better! If we only could show/hide timestamps without leaving conversation window _  it would make this program a perfect
The major overhaul is the cherry on top of the already amazing functionality this app brings.
Simple set up _  weechat relay was a breeze. App runs flawlessly _  fluid _  and looks good to boot. Suggest adding a link on here to your quick start page.
The hotlist _  notifications _   and the UI changes have been amazing. Thank you. I use this app everyday.
I couldn't try it yet because I need socks5 proxy support. Feature request.
It's a very nice app. I love using weechat and this app makes it better to use on my android devices.
Clean _  easy interface and really easy to set up _  even with SSL. Nice work :D
The update was a huge improvement
Network connectivity doesn't crash anymore _  yay!
Finally.
It works
Ten oudda ten
App is really great _  nuff said
Looking good.
Purely wow amazing
Amazing

This is exactly to my taste _  a lot of good design choices here and it's very comfortable to use. It's also free as in freedom which is a huge bonus. I disagree with other commenters stating it's not much better than using an ssh client _  I think the Android client is a much nicer experience myself.  But good things aside _  as it's still in beta with a few prominent bugs it would be silly to give it 5 stars. (Then what would I give it when/if it reaches a more robust state?)  Two of the bugs I've noticed so far is that is seems to randomly crash a lot and that colors in prefixes do not match my weechat.conf while the text does.  I really hope this great app will get further development.

I just recently starting using Weechat in general _  but this Android app is pure icing on the cake. It's got all of the essentially features down pat _  and in a very smooth way. Sure _  there are extras I wouldn't mind having that would be cool to have in the future _  but it's already got everything I actually need.

This application is fantastic. It makes using IRC on your phone a great experience. I  would highly recommend using it. It does have issues with crashing _  but the great interface more than makes up for that.
There are probably things to improve but for me this is already perfect. Let's see how much it will drain battery :-)

Great app to use _  I am just missing the option to get notified when I recieve a highlight or PM. (There is a play sound option but it is not working) would love a traditional notification text-message style

I opened the app and did not see any preferences option in the menu. Just settings. Thinking I was missing something I also went through the readme at the project's Github page _  but couldn't fund anything. I am on HTC one. Maybe this app doesn't work on HTC phones.
Bad. Dont work at all. The worst apps ever
Pure awesome. Combines the best features of ssh and a bouncer!
Nice application but perhaps an update would be nice after 1 year especially since progress has been made in the Repo.
This works great for checking IRC on the go. It'd be nice to remove some of the Gingerbread era UI elements _  though.
Didnt work at all
Server and android app are great _  highly configurable server great plugins ..perfect
